description: This file serves as a logger wrapper that imports a Log class from an external module and provides a factory function to create logger instances.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Factory function that creates and returns a logger instance from the ExternalLog module.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
